function renderLine(line,pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c=strsub(pattern,i,i) if c=="O" then oxyd(i-1,line) set_floor("fl-space",i-1,line) elseif c=="x" then set_stone("st-fakeoxyd",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-space",i-1,line) elseif c=="." then set_floor("fl-space",i-1,line) elseif c=="*" then set_actor("ac-bug",(i-1)+.5,line+.5) elseif c=="+" then set_stone("st-death",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-space",i-1,line) end end end
renderLine(00,"xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx") renderLine(01,"x *.............x") renderLine(02,"x0 *.............x") renderLine(03,"x *.............x") renderLine(04,"xxxxxx.............x") renderLine(05,"x..................x") renderLine(06,"x..................x") renderLine(07,"x..................x") renderLine(08,"x..................x") renderLine(09,"x....+.............x") renderLine(10,"O....+.............x") renderLine(11,"O....+.............x") renderLine(12,"xOOOOxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx")
